title: Senior Software Engineer – Back End (Bangkok based, Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**Get to Know our Team**
 In Agoda’s Back-End Engineering department, we build scalable, fault-tolerant systems and APIs that host our core business logic. Our systems cover all major areas of our business: inventory and pricing, product information, customer data, communications, partner data, booking systems, payments, and more. We employ state-of-the-art CI/CD and testing techniques to ensure everything works without downtime. Our systems are self-healing, responding gracefully to extreme loads or unexpected input. We use modern languages like Kotlin and Scala, Data technologies Kafka, Spark, MLflow, Kubeflow, VastStorage, StarRocks and agile development practices. Most importantly, we hire great people from around the world and empower them to be successful.
   

  

**The Opportunity**
 Agoda Platform team is looking for developers to work on mission-critical systems that serve millions of users daily. You will have the chance to work on innovative projects, using cutting-edge technologies, and make a significant impact on our business and the travel industry.
   

  

**What You’ll Need To Succeed**
* 5+ years of experience developing performance-critical applications in a production environment using Scala, Java, Kotlin, C#, Go or relevant modern programming languages.
* Strong RDBMS knowledge (SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, or other).
* Ability to design and implement scalable architectures
* Deeply involved in hands-on coding, developing and maintaining high-quality software solutions on a daily basis
* Good command of the English language.
* Engages in cross-team collaborations to ensure cohesive solutions
* Implement advanced CI/CD pipelines and robust testing strategies to ensure seamless integration, deployment, and high code quality.
* Passion for software development and continuous improvement of your knowledge and skills.


**It’s Great if You Have**
* Knowledge in NoSQL, Queueing systems (Kafka, RabbitMQ, ActiveMQ, MSMQ), and Play framework.


 #newdelhi #Pune #Hyderabad #Bangalore #Mumbai #Bengaluru #Chennai #Kolkata #Lucknow #sanfrancisco #sanjose #losangeles #sandiego #oakland #denver #miami #orlando #atlanta #chicago #boston #detroit #newyork #portland #mexico #sydney #melbourne #toronto #vancouver #shanghai #beijing #shenzhen#estonia #paris #hongkong #budapest #jakarta #bali #kualalumpur #dublin #berlin #telaviv #milan #rome #tokyo #osaka #amsterdam #oslo #manila #warsaw #krakow #moscow #saintpetersburg #capetown #johannesburg #seoul #barcelona #madrid #stockholm #zurich #taipei #bangkok #chiangmai #phuket #istanbul #london #manchester #edinburgh #kiev #hcmc #hanoi #hochimin #wroclaw #poznan #katowice #rio #salvador #dhaka #islamabad #IT #ENG #4
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .
   

  

 To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

title: Software Electrical RUP Engineer
description:
BROMMA has been the leading manufacturer of crane spreaders ever since its formation in the 1960s. Today we have, by far, the highest market share of the world’s spreader suppliers. In fact, our market share is higher than all our competitors’ combined. Today, we manufacture close to 2,000 spreaders of all types every year and our spreaders are currently in use in 99 of the top-100 ports world- wide.
   

  

 BROMMA sales and service network has a wide-reaching footprint. We are present with own sales offices on all continents, and with an extensive network of agents, we are able to support customers in every country in the world.
   

  

 More information about BROMMA can be found on www.bromma.com
   

  

****We're making every move count****
 We are looking for a
 **Software / Electrical RUP Engineer** 
 to join our global team.
   

  

 As a Software / Electrical RUP Engineer you will prepare and be responsible for the software and electrical design including installation instructions for upgrade projects for existing spreaders, ensure the testing and be responsible for the quality of the solutions delivered, and that it is according to required standards and directives, as well as lead and coordinate the customer projects.
   

  

****Main tasks and responsibilities****
* Prepare and responsible for RUP software, electrical design, electrical drawing specification, and installation instructions
* Create software and electrical design/BOM list for customer quotations & customer orders
* Prepare cost & price calculations for software & electrical design
* Proactively implement solutions to improve RUP quality (not only in design but also as part of the rest of the order to delivery process)
* Drive and responsible for software & electrical RUP quality (from order to delivery)
* Responsible to support software & electrical RUP projects during installation
* Develop and design testing solutions and prepare test instructions for software and electrical RUP (Retrofit & Upgrade Projects) design
* Coordinate with regional teams and engineers to ensure project execution meets technical specifications and compliance standards (e.g. CE requirements), including RUP software and electrical design
* Act as a technical representative in New Product Development projects, while also mentoring new engineers and providing technical support for spare parts and related inquiries.


****What you’ll need to succeed****
**Education**
* BSc or MSc in Software or Electrical Engineering.


**Experience**
* 7-10 years of hands-on experience in software design or electrical circuitry, ideally in industrial or heavy machinery settings.


**Technical Expertise**
* Proficiency with electrical control system and software platforms such as CoDeSys or similar
* Experience in design tools such as EPLAN, E3 PRO, or equivalent
* Understanding of machinery standards, power supply systems, and electrical control systems
* Background in service operations and evaluating designs from both internal and customer perspectives
* Strong skills in technical documentation and report writing
* Technical hands-on experience with global customer engagement
* Familiarity with Google Suite tools for day-to-day collaboration.


**Soft Skills**
* Able to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines efficiently
* Strong team player, contributing to design improvement and product growth
* Self-driven, resourceful, and creative with a problem-solving mindset
* Skilled at prioritizing resources, profitability, and market needs
* Strong technical analytical skills with an interest in sharing knowledge
* Effective communicator, delivering results and meeting customer expectations.


**Other Requirements**
* Fluent in English, writing and speaking
* Other language skills are an advantage
* Willingness to travel.


****You will be part of****
 We believe in our people as it is our people who really make the difference. We always work in close collaboration with our customers, deliver on our promises and never walk away no matter how big the challenge. We succeed because we do it together.
   

  

 With us, you will have the opportunity to realise your potential and become an important member of our global team.
   

  

****Interested to join?****
 If you're excited about this role, please submit your application until 30.05.2025.
   

  

 Bromma is part of Kalmar.
   

  

**About Kalmar**
 Kalmar (Nasdaq Helsinki: KALMAR) is moving goods in critical supply chains around the world, with the vision to be the forerunner in sustainable material handling equipment and services. The company offers a wide range of industry shaping heavy material handling equipment and services to ports and terminals, distribution centres, manufacturing and heavy logistics. Headquartered in Helsinki, Finland, Kalmar operates globally in over 120 countries and employs approximately 5,200 people. In 2024, the company's sales totalled approximately EUR 1.7 billion.
   

  

 www.kalmarglobal.com

title: Project Development Manager
job_function: Project Management, Business Development, and Strategy/Planning
company_industry: Services for Renewable Energy and Electric Power Transmission, Control, and Distribution
description:
Do you want to be part of facilitating the green transition? Do you thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment where your actions drive meaningful change? Do you enjoy solving hard problems together with ambitious people? If this sounds like you, this could be a perfect match.
 



  





**Join us to facilitate the green transition** 




 Electrification and the transition to fossil-free energy create fantastic opportunities for us as individuals, as a company, and for society at large. However, it also creates challenges, especially for our energy system. Ingrid Capacity is a new kind of energy company on a mission to shape the future of energy. We challenge conventional energy models with intelligent energy services for grid operators and users. By uniquely combining software, hardware, and commercial innovation, we tackle one of the biggest bottlenecks to the energy transition: electricity grid constraints. This enables us to accelerate electrification and contribute to a more resilient, competitive, and sustainable energy system. Our impact is here and now. Since our founding in 2022, we have built a leading electricity trading and optimization platform, commissioned and now operate over 200 MWh of large-scale energy storage facilities, and have an additional 340 MWh under construction across Europe. Today, Ingrid Capacity is in a rapid growth phase.
 



  





**About the role** 




 We are looking for an experienced and hands-on professional to lead the development of our energy storage projects. In this role you will be a key player in ensuring the success of the projects, leading negotiations and execution of grid connection, stakeholder engagement, permitting, and land acquisition. The ability to adapt to changes and work efficiently while maintaining quality will be crucial for the role. You will join a dedicated team and be part of Ingrid Capacity’s continuous growth journey. In this role, you will work with a wide range of stakeholders, from landowners, grid owners, authorities, and utilities as well as internal stakeholders working with finance, engineering and planning to ensure smooth project delivery.
 



  





 The role offers variety and requires a hands-on approach, as you will be managing strategic planning as well as negotiating agreements and collaborations. You will take full ownership of projects, guiding them from concept to construction-ready status, proactively managing challenges along the way. This will include traveling to sites for assessments, stakeholder meetings, and ensuring that development milestones are met.
 



  





 You will report to the Head of Project Development.
 



  





**Key Responsibility** 



* Drive project development efforts, to secure land, permits, and grid connections to reach RtB status.
* Negotiate agreements and build strong relationships with key stakeholders.
* Ensure strong financial viability and technical excellence as well as drive continuous improvements in all aspects of development.
* Navigate regulatory processes and stay ahead of market trends to ensure compliance and long-term project viability.
* Identify and proactively address project risks through strategic planning and problem-solving.
* Oversee project documentation to ensure compliance with industry standards, and seamless project handover.
* Represent the company at industry events, fostering strategic partnerships and collaborations.
* Work cross-functionally to align technical, financial, and regulatory aspects of projects to drive innovation and contribute to the company’s long-term growth and success.



  





**Key qualifications** 



* 5+ years of experience in project development, preferably in renewable energy or energy storage.
* University degree in engineering, business, management or a related field.
* Technical expertise in energy markets and understanding of grid infrastructure.
* Experience in renewable energy project development is highly desirable, providing valuable industry-specific knowledge and insight.
* Fluency in English; additional languages are a plus.



  





**Personal Skills** 




 In addition to relevant work experience, we’re looking for someone with the right personal skills and motivation, and a genuine passion for renewable energy.
 



  




* Negotiation and stakeholder management skills – Adept at engaging stakeholders at all levels.
* Project management and structured problem-solving skills – Enjoys tackling complex challenges with creativity.
* Relationship and trust building skills – Understanding counterparties’ challenges and positions; having conversations that make a positive impact; and resolving issues in a timely way.
* Hands-on and pragmatic – Able to take on a wide range of tasks to get the job done.
* Eager to learn and continuously improve – Proactive approach to exploring innovative solutions.
* Driven self-leader – Takes initiatives, drives projects forward independently and actively seeks growth opportunities.
* Thrives in fast-paced environments – Demonstrating resilience and adaptability to change.
* Collaborative and communicative – Ensuring smooth internal and external alignment.



  





**What we offer** 




 At Ingrid Capacity, we are not just employees; we are pioneers, visionaries, and catalysts for change. We are at the forefront of the global energy transition, dedicated to shaping the future of power generation. Our company is more than a workplace; it is a platform for innovation, where we dare to push boundaries and turn bold ideas into reality.
 



  





 We firmly believe that the foundation of any successful company lies in its culture. At Ingrid Capacity, we understand that building a thriving organization demands more than just technology and innovation; it requires a company culture firmly rooted in trust, growth, and the ability to learn from mistakes. We believe that skills can be nurtured in a variety of contexts, starting from within oneself and growing together with people we trust. We are also serious about the wellbeing of our colleagues and having fun together, and with regularly hosted social activities and group training classes, we create a workplace where we can truly thrive.
 



  





**Application** 




 Sounds like a match? Don’t be a stranger and welcome to apply! We’ll make selections on an ongoing basis and finalize the recruitment as soon as we’ve found the perfect match.
 



 We look forward to hearing from you!
 



  





 /Team Ingrid Capacity

title: Analysingenjör
description:
Är du redo som Analysingenjör att vara en viktig del av en revolution inom analys för att göra Atea en mer datadriven verksamhet? På Atea skapar vi framtidens analytics plattform och arbetsätt med dataprodukter som gör det möjligt för våra konsumenter att enkelt tillämpa self-service för att skapa dashboards för affärsvärde eller AI-applikationer för ökad produktivitet snabbare än tidigare. Vi söker nu en passionerad och driven analysingenjör med erfarenhet av dataanalys, som vill vara med och forma framtiden tillsammans med oss


**Din roll**
------------



 Vi söker en ny roll som analysingenjör med dataanalytiker kompetens inom Power BI för att stötta och utveckla alla avdelningar inom Atea Sverige. I en tid då data blir allt viktigare för att skapa kundvärde och affärsnytta, kommer du att spela en central roll i att utveckla främst våra dataprodukter i Fabric, men även dashboards och rapporter för Atea’s olika avdelningars analys och beslutsunderlag.



I rollen som Analysingenjör hos oss kommer du att:


* Leda kravställning för bygga och vidareutveckla dataprodukter och datamodeller för en datamarknad för verksamhetens behov, så att de kan bygga rapporter, dashboards i Power BI eller andra applikationer. Samt driva stegen mot prediktiv analys.
* Vara en brygga mellan Data Engineers och Data Scientist/ Data Analyst. Utveckla och förvalta olika typer av dataprodukter som stödjer företagets affärsmål. Stor kunskap i att bygga datamodeller, semantiska modeller som ger specifika utdata som andra kan använda när de skapar nya analyslösningar. Därav modeller för prediktiv analys.
* Tech Lead för Analytics Governance, uppgift är att säkerställa och sätta ramar för domän och konsumtionslagret (Datamarket) inom Fabric och Purview, så att det blir så användarvänligt som möjligt och att vi återanvänder dataprodukter så mycket som möjligt. Gör det så enkelt som möjligt med Self-service för konsumenter och applikationer (AI).
* Bygga och vidareutveckla Rapporter och Dashboards i Power BI för olika avdelningar i verksamheten, men även för Atea Analytics portal.
* Vidareutveckla vår analytics dataplattform

**Ditt Team**
-------------



Teamet Central Analytics är en ny avdelning som byggs upp nu, och du är första teammedlemmen. Team ansvarar för att analys plattformen och Self-Service fungerar optimalt för Atea Sverige. Bygger dataprodukter och rapporter för avdelningar som saknar egna analysresurser. Skapar dashboards för Atea Analytics-portalen "One truth". Arbetar med Analytics Governance genom att utveckla och förvalta processer, principer och design för Atea Sveriges analysarbete.



Teamets mål är att tillhandahålla högkvalitativa och tillgängliga dataprodukter för analytiker, data scientist och affärsanalytiker (Self-servcie). Se till att dataprodukter och dataset skapar affärsvärde.



”På Atea får du jobba med kollegor med starkt driv, högt i tak med expertkunskap som gillar det nya sättet att arbeta och ses därför gärna både på kontoret och digitalt. Vi trivs med varandra och det ansvar vi har, och vi har ett arbetsklimat som främjar nytänkande och driver förändring.” Caj Andersson, ansvarig Analytics



Din närmaste chef är Alexander Carracedo, Analyschef, som har en bred bakgrund från analys, data och KPI:er. Har varit ledare i olika områden inom Analytics i 10+ år. Senaste 7 åren har han jobbat som konsult och hjälpt flera företag att förbättra och utveckla analytiska förmågan både som strateg, produktägare och teamlead.


**Vem är du?**
--------------



Du har en god social kompetens och trivs att samarbeta med andra eftersom du kommer att ha ett nära samarbete med analytiker, kravställare och rapportägarna och andra kompetenser inom Atea. Du har sinne för att hitta nya lösningar, uppskattar möjligheten att möta nya utmaningar och söker aktivt efter utvecklingsmöjligheter. Du är noggrann och kvalitetsmedveten i ditt arbete och planerar, organiserar och prioriterar arbetet effektivt för att hålla deadlines. Du har en vilja att utvecklas till en toppexpert inom Fabric genom att använda de senaste verktygen och funktionerna. Du blir motiverad av att arbeta i tvärfunktionella team och ta del av och bidra till en utvecklande kultur för att hjälp dina kollegor att bli mer datadrivna.



I rollen som Analysingenjör ser vi att du har med dig:


* Stark analytisk förmåga och erfarenhet av dataanalysverktyg som SQL, Python eller R. Men även god förståelse för ETL processer och data pipelines.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Fabric och BI-verktyg som Power BI.
* Förmåga att kommunicera komplex data struktur på ett begripligt sätt.
* God förståelse för statistiska metoder och datamodellering.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och i team, med stark problemlösningsförmåga.
* Förståelse för Informationsmodellering, Dimensionsmodeller
* Tidigare erfarenhet att samla och dokumentera behov
* Van att arbeta med agila metoder i iterativa, sprintbaserade utvecklingscykler
* Obehindrad i svenska och engelska språket i tal och skrift


Meriterande:


* Azure DevOps
* Erfarenhet av Microsoft Purview
* Tidigare erfarenhet av förvaltning
* Kunskap om affärsrapportering, förmåga att diskutera rapportinnehåll och behov med både ekonomi- och verksamhetschefer i vår sälj och konsultorganisation
* Relevant utbildning som exempelvis inom analys, redovisning, finans eller IT/data inriktad civilekonom- eller civilingenjörsexamen

**Om Atea**
-----------



Visste du att Atea är den ledande leverantören av IT-infrastruktur i Norden och Baltikum? I Sverige är vi runt 2700 medarbetare fördelade på 35 kontor runt om i hela landet. Vår styrka ligger i vår kombination av lokal närvaro, vårt omfattande och heltäckande erbjudande samt alla våra specialister. Tillsammans med våra kunder och partners bygger vi Sverige med IT och förbättra vardagen för skolbarn, lärare, äldre, sjukvård och näringslivet. Hos oss får du vara en del av världens mest hållbara IT-servicebolag, där vi är med och påskyndar omställningen mot en mer hållbar IT-värld.



På Atea blir du en del av en vardag och en kultur som präglas av framåtanda, laganda och humor. Vi har en vision om att vara "The Place to Be" – en plats där alla växer och trivs, med kollegor som bryr sig om dig, om kunderna och om samhället.


**Kontakt & mer information**
-----------------------------



Har du frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Alexander Carracedo, Analyschef, via Alexander.carracedo@atea.se. Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, ansök därmed redan idag!



Som en kvalitativ del i vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår slutkandidater en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om dig som vår framtida medarbetare.



Atea vill vara The Place To Be, den självklara platsen, för alla människor då vi värdesätter och jobbar aktivt med mångfald och inkludering.



Vi hoppas på att få se din ansökan!

  


**Följ oss i sociala medier**

  

#LI-HYBRID


Ansök nu
  
Dela denna sida
Stad
Stockholm
Sista ansökan
2025-05-24
Ansök nu

title: DevOps
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**

  

* Solve problems related to complex cloud-infrastructure automation, multi-region networking, authentication/authorization, logging/metrics collection at scale.
* Lead/contribute to engineering efforts from design to implementation, solving complex technical challenges around monitoring distributed systems at scale.
* Drive the roadmap for the Observability platforms in conjunction with cross-functional partners. Bring together multiple perspectives and be the key connector in this important and highly visible role.
* Build, lead and mentor an Observability team.
* Participate in deep technical design discussions within your to ensure that the right systems are being built.
* Drive adoption of best practices in monitoring, alerting, and performance.
* Work closely with development teams to implement monitoring & observability instrumentation within their platforms.
* Participate in an 24/7 oncall rotation for Monitoring & Observability services.
* Containerization & Container Orchestration (i.e. Docker, Kubernetes)

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* You have a Bachelor’s in computer science, related field, or equivalent work experience.
* You have previous experience delivering Observability at scale is required.
* You have working knowledge of Kubernetes.
* You have knowledge of distributed Systems Development (e.g. asynchronous communication patterns, consensus algorithms, distributed transactions).
* You have strong programming skills in Java and Typescript.
* You have experience working with Linux systems.
* You have strong interpersonal and collaborative skills.
* You have Tool knowledge (e.g. Terraform, CDK, Pulumi, CloudFormation).

  

  

  

**Application deadline:** 30-04-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  


  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Arbetsmiljöingenjör (Occupational Health & Safety...
description:
**Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a**  

  

  

  

**Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our**

**About VIPAS :**


Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.

**Job Description:**


We are currently looking for an experienced **Occupational Health & Safety Engineer** to lead and manage workplace safety efforts for our client. You will play a central role in ensuring the work environment complies with Swedish regulations, ISO standards, and the client's internal policies across two production sites in Uppland.

**Key Responsibilities:**


As an HSE Engineer, your responsibilities will include:

* Acting as the main point of contact with **Arbetsmiljöverket** (Swedish Work Environment Authority) during inspections and incident investigations
* Serving as the liaison with **Global EHS** on occupational health and safety matters
* Collaborating with management teams, safety groups, and employees across two factories
* Communicating and following up on work environment goals and performance with safety committees and other stakeholders
* Monitoring and improving workplace health and safety performance
* Ensuring compliance with current **occupational health and safety legislation**
* Managing the **IKEMIA** work environment system
* Creating and tracking **KPIs** to measure safety performance
* Supporting the development and follow-up of organizational safety goals
* Working closely with company leadership to:
* Maintain and develop the **ISO 45001** management system
* Ensure systematic work environment processes aligned with ISO 45001 standards

**Requirements:**

* **5+ years of experience** in occupational health and safety
* Proven experience working with and maintaining **ISO 45001** systems
* Hands-on experience leading HSE audits and compliance efforts
* Experience as a **superuser** of incident reporting systems such as **IA** or equivalent
* Advanced **Excel skills**—able to manage and analyze large data sets for trend analysis
* Fluent in both **Swedish and English** (written and spoken)
* Strong **leadership and collaboration** skills, with the ability to build trust and influence stakeholders across functions

**Desired Competence Areas*** Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE)
* Occupational Safety Standards (ISO 45001)
* Risk Management
* Incident Reporting Systems

**Why Join Us?**



Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.


You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!


Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at swathianantu@vipas.se


Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.

 **How to Apply:**


Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!

  

Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Test Automation Engineer
description:

On behalf of our client, we are looking for a **Test Automation Engineer** to join the team working on a new savings platform. This is an exciting opportunity to be a key player in ensuring product quality and delivering a world-class customer experience.


In this role you will work within an agile test team in the SI6 Program and focus on developing and implementing test automation. The role involves being involved in the entire process, from design to scripting, executing and reporting results and defects. * Understanding of **microservices architecture** and associated testing strategies

automation projects.

Playwright, Selenium, (UI automation)

P in Java, JavaScript for writing automated tests.

Knowledge of frontend testing (React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS).

**Application deadline:** 02-05-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  


  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Produktionstekniker – Verktygsberedning i Catia V5/Delmia...
description:
**Gå med i vårt team på VIPAS AB!**


Har du vad som krävs för att trivas i den dynamiska IT-konsultvärlden? VIPAS AB, ett växande företag, bjuder in dig att ta del av nästa spännande projekt som vår nya medarbetare!

**Om VIPAS:**  

Föreställ dig en värld där din affärsteknik är perfekt anpassad till dina mål – effektiv, skalbar och innovativ. På VIPAS AB är det precis vad vi strävar efter att skapa. Som ett IT-konsultföretag erbjuder vi inte bara tjänster, vi levererar skräddarsydda lösningar med hjälp av den senaste tekniken som Java och Python. Vårt team har gedigen erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling, DevOps och ingenjörskonst, och vi leder er genom den moderna teknikens landskap med trygghet och framförhållning.

**Jobbeskrivning:**


Är du en erfaren produktionstekniker med passion för verktygsberedning och ett öga för smarta tillverkningslösningar? Nu söker vi en konsult till ett spännande uppdrag inom försvarsindustrin – där din tekniska kompetens kommer göra skillnad i utvecklingen av verktyg till flygplansproduktion.  

  

Om uppdraget  

Hos vår kund, ett ledande bolag inom försvars- och säkerhetsindustrin, blir du en del av ett dedikerat team som arbetar tätt mellan konstruktion, logistik, produktion och stödjande funktioner. Ditt fokus ligger på beredning av underlag för tillverkning samt inköp av verktyg och testutrustning till flygplansproduktion.  

  

Du ansvarar för att analysera konstruktionsunderlag, identifiera optimala tillverkningsmetoder för ingående artiklar och samverka med inköpsfunktionen för att hitta rätt leverantörer. Rollen ger även möjlighet att bidra till förbättring och utveckling av befintliga arbetssätt med målet att säkerställa en effektiv och kvalitetssäkrad produktion.

 **Krav:**

* 3–7 års erfarenhet av produktionstekniskt arbete, gärna med inriktning mot verktyg
* Produktionsteknisk utbildning eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med konstruktionsunderlag
* God vana av Catia V5 och Delmia V5
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
* Erfarenhet av beredning i affärssystem (meriterande)
* Bakgrund från verkstadsarbete (meriterande)

  

Övrig information  

* Arbetsmodell: På plats
* Placeringsort: Linköping

  

Säkerhetsprövning: Säkerhetsklassad roll. Godkänd säkerhetsprövning enligt gällande bestämmelser krävs.

**Varför jobba hos oss?**  

VIPAS AB erbjuder attraktiva anställningspaket för IT-konsulter, i enlighet med Teknikföretagens (Almega) kollektivavtal. Att arbeta med oss innebär möjligheter inom olika branscher, vilket ger dig flexibilitet och möjligheter till utveckling. Om du är drivande och redo att anta nya utmaningar, är VIPAS familjen för dig!


Du kommer att vara en del av ett innovativt team som driver framtiden inom telekom, fordon, detaljhandel och bank. Om du är redo att ta dig an utmanande projekt och växa i en banbrytande miljö, är detta möjligheten för dig!

**Ansök nu**  

Tveka inte att kontakta oss på **swati@vipas.se**

**Observera:** Ansök om du har **Sveriges PR/citizenship** eller ett **arbetstillstånd för Sverige**.

**Hur ansöker du:**  

Intresserade kandidater uppmanas att skicka in sitt CV och personliga brev. Gå med oss och driv innovation på VIPAS AB!


Observera att vi rekryterar löpande, vilket innebär att uppdraget kan stängas innan sista ansökningsdatum. Om du är intresserad rekommenderar vi att du ansöker omedelbart!

description:

title: Design Engineer within mechatronics - Huskvarna
description:
**Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a Design Engineer**  

  

**Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our next star**

**About VIPAS :**


Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.

**Job Description:**


We are now looking for a skilled Design Engineer within mechatronics with a strong focus on project deliveries as well as cross-functional team and supplier interaction.You are going to work in a highly motivated team at Huskvarna, Sweden location. Power Systems is responsible for the development of the powertrain in both Battery and Petrol products. We develop next generation handheld products for forest industry and urban environments. You will have a key role in the development of our future products and electric motors.To thrive in this role, you are initiative, curious, driven and have a great interest in technical details. You should enjoy working alone as well as in a team. You have high ability to communicate and can easily make decisions.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Design electric motor components.
* 2D and 3D modeling (Catia & SmarTeam).
* New development as well as improvements on existing products.
* Support “Squad” and Team deliveries, internal and external relations.
  

**Requirements:**

* Master’s Degree in Mechanical Engineering.
* 3+ years of experience (academic or professional) in Mechanical Design.
* Experience with Design tools such as Catia, Office, Matlab.
* Experience with Smarteam is meritorious.
* Ability to work together with design engineers and solve technical issues.
* Strong communication and presentation skills – both verbal and written.
* Fluent in English.

**Good to have:**

  

* Experience in testing of electric motors.
* Use of development of motor controller.
* Calibration and practice of motor management systems.
* Knowledge in the design of light metal, machining and molding tools.
* Understanding of electric motor manufacturing methods and processes.
* Development of high-volume products.

**Why Join Us?**



Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.


You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!


Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at shivangi@vipas.se


Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.

 **How to Apply:**


Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!

  

Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Product Owner, Cloud (Stockholm)
description:
We are a team of dedicated software developers, big data engineers, data scientists, telco engineers, and sales professionals, with marketing, finance, HR, and other business professionals supporting the core roles.  

  

What we do at Elisa Polystar is not taught in textbooks. With us, you get to join in the pioneering work of AI-driven network analytics and assurance.  

  

We believe in transparency and a Nordic work culture – allowing you to make a significant contribution while maintaining a healthy work–life balance.


### **MEET**


  
### **Product Owner, Cloud (Stockholm) – Sweden**


**Lead our Customer Experience Assurance cloud journey: Join us as Product Owner!**


Are you ready to take the helm of our cloud journey for the company Customer Experience Assurance (CEA) solution? We are seeking a dynamic and visionary Product Owner with deep cloud expertise to drive the next steps of this exciting transformation.


As a Product Owner, you will be at the forefront of CEA cloud strategy, and technically responsible for the overall success and growth of related cloud initiatives. This hands-on role demands exceptional communication skills to collaborate seamlessly with our talented software teams, engage in strategic discussions with business leaders, and connect with our valued customers. Your contributions will shape the vision and roadmap for our CEA cloud journey, ensuring we deliver innovative and impactful solutions. You will work with a talented team of product managers and product owners with deep subject matter expertise in several domains, and You will report to business owner of Customer Experience Assurance


If you are passionate about cloud technology, want to work with systems that process and store massive amount of data in real time, and eager to make a significant impact, we invite you to join our skilled product management team and lead us into the future!

**Why consider Elisa Polystar?**


We are an international software company with HQ in Stockholm, with operation in 20+ countries. We specialize in analytics and assurance software solutions for communication service providers, with running business of 100+ telecom clients across the globe. We are part of Elisa Group of companies.

**Key Responsibilities Includes:**

**Contribute to the Roadmap and Share Technical Insights:**

* Work closely with the product management team to contribute to the product roadmap. Share technical insights and feedback from the development team to help shape the future direction of the product.

**Represent Product Towards Customers:**

* Act as a point of contact for customers. Ensure that customer expectations are managed and that they are kept informed about the product’s progress and any updates.

**Lead the Development Team and Be Responsible for Day-to-Day Activities:**

* **Prioritization of Work and Team Backlog Management:** Ensure that the development team is working on the most important tasks by managing and prioritizing the backlog.
* **Sprint planning, Timeline and Effort Estimates:** Work with the development team to provide accurate timeline and effort estimates for upcoming tasks and projects.

**User Stories with Acceptance Criteria and Low-Level Requirements:**

* **User Stories with Acceptance Criteria:** Write detailed user stories that clearly define the requirements and acceptance criteria. This ensures that the development team understands what needs to be built and how it will be evaluated.
* **Low-Level Requirements:** Break down high-level requirements into low-level, actionable tasks. This helps the development team to implement features accurately and efficiently.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s Degree, or higher, in Computer Science, Information Systems, Data Science, or a related field.
* Experience of working as a software developer.
* Multiple years of experience in cloud transformation, cloud architecture, or a similar role.
* Proficient in various cloud platforms and tools, such as AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, etc.
* Knowledgeable in cloud-native architecture, microservices, CI/CD, DevOps, and cloud security concepts and techniques.
* As part of the recruitment, we conduct background check on the final candidate.

**Location:**

* Besides other Elisa Polystar locations, the role can be based in Stockholm with PO and SME colleagues.
* Alternative good location is in Umeå, Sweden, where majority of SW development team works.
* The company follows a flexible hybrid work policy (2-3 days per week at the office).


If you have questions, please reach out to our recruiter Saku Tihveräinen on LinkedIn or via email (@elisapolystar.com). ASAP as we’ll be interviewing on a rolling basis.

**Interested? We look forward to hearing from you!**

title: Systemspecialist eCommerce
description:
Är du en lagspelare i grunden som är redo för att förändra hur våra kunder handlar it-relaterade produkter i framtiden? Just nu söker vi på Atea dig som vill jobba som systemspecialist i vårt eCommerce-team. Hos oss får du möjlighet att växa både professionellt och som människa. Vi värdesätter dina unika styrkor och erfarenheter, och tillsammans gör vi skillnad varje dag. Tillsammans bygger vi Sverige med it.


**Din roll**
------------



Inom området Atea eCommerce ingår Ateas eHandelsportal Atea eShop, vår självbetjäningsportal My Atea, Produkt & Pricing samt Analytics. Ateas eHandel är en av Sveriges största inom B2B sett till omsättning. Vi erbjuder en utvecklande roll där varje dag bjuder på nya utmaningar att lösa tillsammans med dina kollegor på Atea.



I din roll som systemspecialist kommer du att ingå i ett team med andra systemspecialister samt ha en strategiskt viktig uppgift i att utveckla våra produkter med kunden i fokus samtidigt som vi effektiviserar våra egna affärsprocesser. Du kommer att ha en nyckelroll i digitaliseringen av affärsområdet Software.



Som systemspecialist inom eCommerce agerar du som en länk mellan verksamheten och våra utvecklingsteam. Det är du som fångar upp kundens samt interna behov/önskemål och omvandlar det till krav på ny eller förbättrad funktionalitet i våra produkter eShop och My Atea. Arbetet innefattar mycket kontakt med kollegor i övriga Atealänder.


**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter**


* Leda eller delta i utvecklingsarbete eller projekt för Atea eShop och My Atea.
* Skriva kravspecifikationer för önskad funktionalitet.
* Agera systemspecialist för Atea eShop och My Atea samt ingå som systemspecialist i Ateas förvaltningsmodell för interna system.
* Utföra förvaltningsaktiviteter t.ex. hantera inkommande förfrågningar, utbildnings- och kompetenshöjande insatser samt dokumentation och information kring dessa.
* Ha löpande kontakter av felanmälningsärenden och anpassningsspecifikationer.
* Ur användarperspektiv fånga upp problem, behov och önskemål i verksamheten och i förekommande fall hos kund. Även proaktivt identifiera och föreslå förbättringar i befintliga lösningar.
* Fungera som bollplank mot utvecklingsteamen.

**Vem är du?**
--------------



Du har ett proaktivt förhållningssätt och söker lösningar i uppkomna problem där du fungerar konstruktivt både på egen hand och i grupp. Som person har du en utåtriktad personlighet med ett driv, samtidigt som du är organiserad och noggrann. För att nå höga mål har du ett analytiskt förhållningssätt med förmåga till självständig problemlösning. Vidare ser vi gärna att du har goda insikter i gränslandet mellan verksamhetens behov och teknikens möjligheter. Du har en positiv inställning till förändring och du vill fortsätta utvecklas i din yrkesroll. Du är bra på att skapa relationer och ger ett förtroendeingivande och trovärdigt intryck. För att lyckas i tjänsten som systemspecialist bör du ha följande kunskaper:


* Erfarenhet av kravanalys och kravspecifikation
* Goda erfarenheter av systemutveckling
* Erfarenhet av agil utvecklingsmetodik
* Erfarenhet av att jobba i Azure DevOps
* Väl utvecklad analytisk förmåga
* God dokumentationsvana
* Obehindrad i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska
* Microsoft Office / Office 365


Meriterande kunskaper:


* eHandelserfarenhet
* Erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling
* Försäljning av mjukvara
* Digitalisering

**Om Atea**
-----------



Visste du att Atea är den ledande leverantören av IT-infrastruktur i Norden och Baltikum? I Sverige är vi runt 2700 medarbetare fördelade på 35 kontor runt om i hela landet. Vår styrka ligger i vår kombination av lokal närvaro, vårt omfattande och heltäckande erbjudande samt alla våra specialister. Tillsammans med våra kunder och partners bygger vi Sverige med IT och förbättra vardagen för skolbarn, lärare, äldre, sjukvård och näringslivet. Hos oss får du vara en del av världens mest hållbara IT-servicebolag, där vi är med och påskyndar omställningen mot en mer hållbar IT-värld.



På Atea blir du en del av en vardag och en kultur som präglas av framåtanda, laganda och humor. Vi har en vision om att vara "The Place to Be" – en plats där alla växer och trivs, med kollegor som bryr sig om dig, om kunderna och om samhället.


**Kontakt & mer information**
-----------------------------



Har du frågor om tjänsten är du varmt välkommen att kontakta Andreas Malm, Chef eShop, via andreas.malm@atea.se. Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, ansök därmed redan idag!



Som en kvalitativ del i vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår slutkandidater en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om dig som vår framtida medarbetare.



Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

  


**Följ oss i sociala medier**

  

#LI-HYBRID


Ansök nu
  
Dela denna sida
Stad
Stockholm
Sista ansökan
2025-05-31
Ansök nu

title: Testledare
description:
**Testledare till uppdrag inom digitalisering av dokumentationsprocesserBakgrund & uppdragsbeskrivning**  
Soros söker nu, å kunds vägnar, en erfaren testledare till ett långsiktigt och samhällsviktigt uppdrag inom ett större digitaliseringsprogram. Projektet syftar till att förbättra granskningsprocesser och den totala dokumentationshanteringen inom anläggningsprojekt. Rollen innebär ansvar för att planera, samordna och leda testarbetet i ett specifikt projektspår, med möjlighet till att stötta andra projekt inom samma program.Uppdraget innebär ett nära samarbete med verksamhetsspecialister och IT-resurser och omfattar både egenutvecklade lösningar och införande av standardsystem.**Arbetsuppgifter** Som testledare kommer du att:

* Leda, koordinera och rapportera projektets test- och kvalitetssäkringsarbete
* Upprätta och implementera teststrategi, testplan och testrapport i linje med etablerade processer
* Delta i och stödja testdokumentation och testutförande, inklusive framtagning av testdata och testfall
* Ansvara för delar av testaktiviteter i t.ex. UAT och End-to-end-tester
* Förankra testarbetet i projektorganisationen samt säkerställa en effektiv överlämning till förvaltningsorganisation

**Obligatoriska krav**

* Högskole-/universitetsutbildning (120/180 hp) inom IT, teknik, data/systemvetenskap, eller minst 6 års erfarenhet som testledare
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet de senaste 10 åren som testare, testanalytiker eller testledare inom IT
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av testledning, testmetodik och kvalitetssäkring
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet från komplexa projekt med många intressenter och beroenden
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av agila arbetsmetoder inom krav- och testarbete

**Mervärdeskrav (prisavdrag i utvärdering vid uppfyllelse)**

* ≥2 års erfarenhet från myndighet/statligt ägt bolag
* ≥2 års erfarenhet av DevOps
* ≥1 års erfarenhet från större organisation (≥500 anställda) med IT-drift

**Personliga egenskaper**

* Flytande svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift
* Självgående och strukturerad
* God kommunikativ och social förmåga
* Administrativt lagd, säkerhetsmedveten och noggrann
* Professionell, lösningsorienterad och kundfokuserad

Vill du vara med och bidra i ett uppdrag som är både tekniknära och samhällskritiskt? Skicka in din ansökan till Soros senast den **2 maj 2025**.

Jobbtyp: Heltid

Arbetsort: På plats

Sista ansökningsdatum: 2025-05-02
